derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French, from Les Baux (the name of a village near Arles in SE France, near which it was first found) + -ite

entry.def: Bauxite is a clay-like substance from which aluminium is obtained.

means.word_mean: 1. a clay-like mineral; the chief ore of aluminum; composed of aluminum oxides and aluminum hydroxides; used as an abrasive and catalyst
